department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of a pressure calibration system
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires supply and delivery of a Bench Top Modular Pressure Calibration System for use in the Regional Calibration Centre (Pacific) at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON.
duration_in_months: This will be a short term contract with 3 months
